  • Method Details

    • displayGrey

      public int[] displayGrey​(javafx.scene.image.Image image, double tolerance, double smallestGroup, boolean newGroup)
      Method converts image to a black and white array based upon a few specific details
      Parameters:
      image - Image to be converted
      tolerance - Tolerance in which the pixels are selected for the array
      smallestGroup - The minimum size of groups, anything smaller is removed
      newGroup -
      Returns:
      An array with each matching pixel given a value, blanks are set to -1
